Name: ActiveDirectorySQLDatabase
Description: Enteracts with the ActiveDirectory schema in a specified SQL Server database.

Methods.Name: GetGroupLastWhenChangedTime
Methods.Description: Gets the latest time any group was changed from the database.

Arguments.Name: ConnectionName
Arguments.Description: Name of the SQL database Connection

Methods.Name: GetUserLastWhenChangedTime
Methods.Description: Gets the latest time any user was changed from the database.

Arguments.Name: ConnectionName
Arguments.Description: Name of the SQL database Connection

Methods.Name: ImportGroup
Methods.Description: Imports a group object into the database

Arguments.Name: ConnectionName
Arguments.Description: Name of the SQL database Connection

Arguments.Name: GroupJSON
Arguments.Description: The JSON representation of the Group object

Methods.Name: ImportUser
Methods.Description: Imports a user object into the database

Arguments.Name: ConnectionName
Arguments.Description: Name of the SQL database Connection

Arguments.Name: UserJSON
Arguments.Description: The JSON representation of the User object

Methods.Name: ProcessGroupManagerChanges
Methods.Description: Processes all the changes related to group managers

Arguments.Name: ConnectionName
Arguments.Description: Name of the SQL database Connection

Methods.Name: ProcessGroupMembershipChanges
Methods.Description: Processes all the changes related to group memberships

Arguments.Name: ConnectionName
Arguments.Description: Name of the SQL database Connection

Methods.Name: ProcessManagerialChanges
Methods.Description: Processes all the changes related to users' managers

Arguments.Name: ConnectionName
Arguments.Description: Name of the SQL database Connection

Methods.Name: RebuildIndexes
Methods.Description: Rebuild all indexes on the database tables

Arguments.Name: ConnectionName
Arguments.Description: Name of the SQL database Connection
